FCD3AU.original: ~z~take 8 years off my sentence, money in off shore accounts, crazy shit.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~减刑八年，海外账户的钱，各种好处。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~But I was good at it, the best. It was sort of fun, and sort of like living in hell;
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~但我很擅长贩毒，非常擅长。贩毒能给我一些乐趣，也有点像在地狱生活：

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Man, we gonna have some fun... at least we better.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~兄弟，我们去快活快活吧...最好能快活。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~No need to explain to me. I am a long way from a virtuous man.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~没必要跟我解释。我也离道德高地远着呢。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~thought he could be refined and shit,
~z~The world's tough, you lived hard... it's always the same shit with you.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~人世不公，生活不易...你一直都是这样的。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I guess I don't believe in second chances, in redemption.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我想我不相信有第二次机会，也不相信救赎。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~But at the time, fifteen years ago or more now, shit was crazy.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~但在当时，少说十五年前吧，一切都很疯狂。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~after I began dealing and shit. I had ten grand.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~那会儿我开始贩毒了。赚了一万块钱。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Made me fucking miserable, paranoid, angry, and I wasn't even smoking the shit!
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~反而让我痛苦、猜疑、愤怒，没嗑药都这样了！

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I saw eight of my best friends killed in a ditch. You are not the only man to have seen bad things.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我眼睁睁看着八个好朋友在沟里被杀。你不是唯一经历过痛苦的人。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~You know what I miss most about Playboy?
~z~In prison they had me doing all this therapy bullshit. Discuss your childhood, you know?
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我在监狱里接受了各种心理治疗。比如讨论我的童年。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~When I die, I can meet my maker knowing I did not rat people out.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~等我死了，上帝也会说我从未出卖别人。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Yeah, no, I know, man, I know. But they do.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~是的，不会，我知道，兄弟，我知道。但是有人这样。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~always the struggle, and suddenly I had a shit load of money.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~勉强维持温饱，突然间我有了一大笔钱。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~In prison? Sure, but I never did a long stretch.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~监狱吗？当然了，不过都没进去太久。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~No, the problem is you realize it's all the same shit,
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~不是。问题是，你会发现怎么着都一样，

FCD3AU.original: ~z~No, I said let's hang out. If we have fun, it is up to you as much as me.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~没有，我说的是出去转转。真想要快活，不止看我还得看你。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I know. You have high moral standards. For a crack dealer and killer, I mean.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我知道。你的道德标准很高，对于一个毒贩兼杀手来说。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Don't worry about it. Just try to complain less.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~别放在心上。少抱怨几句就好。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I know. It's ridiculous, look at what I became.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我知道。实在荒唐，瞧瞧我现在的样子。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Yeah, me too. Shit's on the up. I hope.
~z~It's strange man, you start off worrying about all the usual shit.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~很奇怪，兄弟，进去后会担心各种平常的事情。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~My childhood, I saw my dad beat my mom. I saw her try so hard.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我小时候，看着我爸打我妈。看着我妈硬撑。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I've seen a lot of friends kill each other. You're not so very different.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我见过许多自相残杀的朋友。你俩不是唯一一对。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~- whole apartments stuffed with bank notes...
~z~He broke them over her back. Fucking animal. I was glad when he died.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~抄起来就往妈背上打。这畜生死的时候我很高兴。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Things shouldn't fucking change. Things hurt man. They hurt. Why you so cold?
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~世道不该变的。这世道很伤人，太伤人了。你怎么这么冷血？

FCD3AU.original: ~z~He doesn't sound like a nice man.
~z~Felt good, for a while. Because I came from nothing. We didn't have shit.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~让我很爽，爽了好久。因为我白手起家，什么都没有。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~with money, broke, happy, unhappy, it don't mean shit.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~大富大贵、两手空空，幸福与否，全都没有意义。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~About some maniac trying to fuck you up the ass, about some other maniac who wants to slash your throat,
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~担心这个疯子想爆你菊花，那个疯子想让你断气，

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I mean, I was never set an example.
~z~I never did it. If I had done, life wouldn't have made sense.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我从没接受过。如果我告密了，人生就没有意义了。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~The money was insane. Crack took off, and it went crazy. I had apartments full of money
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~赚的钱实在吓人。霹雳可卡因出现后更是赚疯了。我好几间公寓里都是钱，

FCD3AU.original: ~z~No... and I couldn't read so good anyway,
~z~Nothing to eat, nowhere to live, and suddenly I was clearing fifty Gs a week.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~没东西吃，没地方住，突然我一星期就能赚五万块。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Let me tell you man, I never wanted to be no drug dealer.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我告诉你，兄弟，我从来没想过要当毒贩。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I looked after people and I looked after myself.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我能养活别人，还能养活自己。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~about the awful food, then that shit ceases to matter.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~担心恶劣的伙食，之后这些担忧就不复存在了。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~he'd say that, then he'd hit me.
~z~Yeah, you learn to cope with the environment, make the best of it, learn to scare people away from you,
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~对，你要学会适应环境、利用环境，学会吓退那些人，

FCD3AU.original: ~z~in prison, outside, with a woman, on your own,
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~蹲号子、闯江湖，搞女人、打光棍，

FCD3AU.original: ~z~but I could add up and I could scare people, so I started slinging dope.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~但我会算数，也会威胁别人，就开始倒货了。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I had no education, I had nothing.
~z~He wanted to be in the game, but he didn't know the rules. We was closer than brothers.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~他想加入毒品游戏，却不知道规则。我们当时比亲兄弟还亲。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~"Expect the worst, then you can only be pleasantly surprised.",
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~「做最坏的打算，就不会有令人失望的结果。」

FCD3AU.original: ~z~And after a while, you stop hurting, and that ain't the problem at all.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~再然后，就没有了烦恼，而这完全不是问题所在。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~When I got arrested, they offered me all kinds of deals -
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我被抓到的时候，他们给了我各种各样的诱惑：

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Shit felt wrong, but it let me do good. I don't know.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~感觉不太正常，但我过上了好日子。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I remember when I met him - he was always a bright kid, but he had no street knowledge.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我还记得刚见到他的时候，这孩子向来聪明，但不懂道上的规矩。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~No. I wanted to be... shit, this'll make you laugh... you know what I wanted to be?
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~没有。我其实想当...妈的，你听了别笑啊...知道我想当什么吗？

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I can't decide if all the people whose lives was ruined by crack were my fault,
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我不知道。我说不清那些吸毒者家破人亡是不是我的错，

FCD3AU.original: ~z~He was like my kid brother - he was like my family.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~他就像是我的弟弟，他就像是我的家人。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~But I know somebody talked to send me down. Guess people gotta live with theirselves.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~但我知道有人把我供出来了。做人还是要讲义气的。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I knew it was wrong, but I felt like I didn't have a choice.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我知道这是错的，但我好像没得选。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I didn't pay any attention at school, never, apart from fighting and beating kids up -
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我在学校就没怎么学过，从没学过。一直都在跟别人打架。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Although as soon as I say that I begin to worry.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~不过刚说完这话我就有点担心了。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Nah, I've seen too much man, I'm too broken. That shit won't work for me.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~不了，我经历过太多了，兄弟，我被伤得很深。这对我不管用。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Go back to elementary school? I think I'm a bit old for that shit, son.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~再回去上小学？我岁数有点大了吧。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Where I grew up, we had no electricity until I was twelve.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~在我老家，直到我十二岁才通了电。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~But it's hard, man. I don't know how to fix that shit. I don't know how to care no more.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~但这很难，兄弟。我不知道要怎么恢复正常。我不知道怎么拾起关心了。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I mean you, we, did what had to be done, but it's a shame.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我是说你、我们，做了不得不做的事，但实在是耻辱。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~He tried to rip off some local dealers. I remember the night they killed him.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~他居然会去骗本地的毒贩。我还记得他遇害的那个晚上。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~the reading bit left me cold, now I can't go for no job because I can't fucking read.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~阅读能力就离我而去了，现在我不识字，根本找不到工作。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~or if I was just taking money any fool would have taken.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~还是说我只是赚了早晚有人来赚的钱。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~My pop's dead, and I didn't feel a damn thing. Shit is fucked up.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我爸死了，我什么感觉都没有。真他妈糟糕。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I know. It's ridiculous. I need some medication or some shit. Take the edge off.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我知道。这很可笑。我可能需要药物治疗，减轻痛苦。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Guy was a fucking fool. He got his, though.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~他他妈就一白痴。不过也遭报应了。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Man I'm lost, prison really messes you up, man.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~兄弟，我很迷茫。监狱真的会让人迷茫，兄弟。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I don't guess it matters too much now.
~z~Man, what I want most ain't a job or nothing. It's a fucking family. I want to be a dad.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~兄弟，我最想要的不是什么工作，而是家庭。我想当一个父亲。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I may be fucking nothing in this life, but there is one thing I ain't, I ain't a fucking snitch.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我这辈子可能什么都不是，但有一点我敢肯定，我他妈的不是告密者。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~And I remember the first time I had ten grand in my hand -
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我还记得第一次拥有一万块钱的时候，

FCD3AU.original: ~z~There was knock at the door. My mom cried, but I don't think she meant it, I hope she didn't.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~有人在外面敲门。我妈在里面哭，但我想她不是故意的，但愿她不是。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~he was a pimp who couldn't read, fuck only knows what she was thinking, and you know what he did?
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~他就一大字不识的皮条客，也不知道妈是怎么想的。你知道他做了啥吗？

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I missed my chance when I started slinging them drugs. Life got too complicated.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~从我开始贩毒的那时起就没有机会了。人生太复杂了。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~This is twenty years ago - they didn't encourage black policemen back then...
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~这是二十年前了，那会儿还不兴黑人警察...

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Crazy, man. You can't ever know what's it like, unless you been real poor.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~很难令人相信，兄弟。如果没过过苦日子，你绝对想象不到。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I remember my dad used to always say,
~z~And look where that ended me up. A long stretch, no family, nothing.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~瞧我现在什么样子。刚蹲完监狱，没有家庭，什么都没有。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~You realize that life don't mean shit man. You teach yourself to stop caring.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~你会发现生活没有意义。会让自己漠不关心。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~You know what, Niko, I always thought of myself as a good person.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~你知道吗，Niko，我一直觉得自己是好人。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Everyone. People only out for one thing - themselves.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~所有人。人们只为一件事考虑——他们自己。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~seeing your old school mates turn into zombies, and knowing they was going to be your best customers.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~看着你的老同学变成行尸走肉，但他们会成为你最好的客户。

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Only an old TV, only old clothes, no books,
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~只有一台老电视，一些旧衣服，没有书，

FCD3AU.original: ~z~I remember once she got pops some golf clubs, 'cause his friend had some,
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我记得因为爸的朋友有高尔夫球杆，妈也给爸弄了一袋，

FCD3AU.original: ~z~Know what? Man... I grew up real poor.
~z~I always tried to live by a code. To be a man who could look at his self in the mirror.
FCD3AU.translated: ~z~我一直想做一个有原则的人，做一个能够正视镜子中的自己的人。
